app.application_description: Monica is a tool to manage your interactions with your loved ones, friends and family.
app.application_og_title: Have better relations with your loved ones. Free Online CRM for friends and family.
app.compliance_desc: We have changed our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. By law we have to ask you to review them and accept them so you can continue to use your account.
app.compliance_desc_end: We don’t do anything nasty with your data or account and will never do.
app.compliance_terms: Accept new terms and privacy policy
app.error_maintenance: Maintenance in progress. Be right back.
app.error_save: We had an error trying to save the data.
app.error_try_again: Something went wrong. Please try again.
app.error_twitter: Follow our Twitter account to be alerted when it’s up again.
app.error_unauthorized: You don’t have the right to edit this resource.
app.footer_modal_version_release_away: You are 1 release behind the latest version available. You should update your instance.|You are :number releases behind the latest version available. You should update your instance.
app.markdown_description: Want to format your text in a nice way? We support Markdown to add bold, italic, lists and more.

auth.login_with_recovery: Bir kurtarma kodu ile giriş yap
auth.mfa_auth_otp: Authenticate with your two factor device
auth.not_authorized: You are not authorized to execute this action

auth.register_invitation_email: For security purposes, please indicate the email of the person who’ve invited you to join this account. This information is provided in the invitation email.
auth.register_login: Zaten bir hesabınız varsa Giriş Yapın.
auth.register_policy: Signing up signifies you’ve read and agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of use.
auth.register_title_welcome: Yeni yüklenen Monica örneğinize hoş geldiniz
auth.throttle: Çok fazla oturum açma girişiminde bulundunuz. Lütfen :seconds saniye içerisinde tekrar deneyiz.
auth.u2f_otp_extension: U2F is supported natively on Chrome, Firefox and Opera. On old Firefox versions, install the U2F Support Add-on.
auth.use_recovery: Or you can use a recovery code

dashboard.dashboard_blank_description: Monica is the place to organize all the interactions you have with the ones you care about.
dashboard.notes_title: Yıldız eklediğiniz herhangi bir not yok.

journal.delete_confirmation: Bu girdiyi silmek istediğinizden emin misiniz?
journal.journal_blank_description: Günlük başından geçen olayları yazmanı ve onları tekrar hatırlamanı sağlar.
journal.journal_come_back: Teşekkürler. Gününü değerlendirmek için yarın tekrar gel.
journal.journal_description: Not: günlük içerikleri hem sizin tarafınızdan hem de bağlantılarınızla olan etkinliklerden otomatik oluşturulur. Günlük girdilerini silebilirsiniz, etkinlikleri bağlantı sayfalarından silmeniz gerekir.
journal.journal_rate: Günün nasıl geçti? Günde bir defa derecelendirebilirsin.

settings.2fa_disable_description: Disable Two Factor Authentication for your account. Be careful, your account will not be secured anymore !
settings.2fa_disable_error: Error when trying to disable Two Factor Authentication
settings.2fa_disable_title: İki Aşamalı Kimlik Doğrulamasını devre dışı bırak
settings.2fa_enable_description: Hesap güvenliğinizi artırmak için iki aşamalı kimlik doğrulamasını etkinleştirin.
settings.2fa_enable_error: Error when trying to activate Two Factor Authentication
settings.2fa_enable_error_already_set: İki aşamalı kimlik doğrulaması zaten etkinleştirildi
settings.2fa_enable_otp: Open up your two factor authentication mobile app and scan the following QR barcode:
settings.2fa_enable_otp_help: If your two factor authentication mobile app does not support QR barcodes, enter in the following code:
settings.2fa_enable_otp_validate: Please validate the new device you’ve just set:
settings.2fa_otp_title: İki Aşamalı Kimlik Doğrulaması mobil uygulama
settings.api_authorized_clients_desc: This section lists all the clients you’ve authorized to access your application. You can revoke this authorization at anytime.
settings.api_description: The API can be used to manipulate Monica’s data from an external application, like a mobile application for instance.
settings.api_oauth_clients_desc: This section lets you register your own OAuth clients.
settings.api_oauth_name_help: Something your users will recognize and trust.
settings.api_oauth_not_created: You have not created any OAuth clients.
settings.api_pao_description: Make sure you give this token to a source you trust – as they allow you to access all your data.
settings.api_token_help: Here is your new personal access token. This is the only time it will be shown so don’t lose it! You may now use this token to make API requests.
settings.api_token_not_created: You have not created any personal access tokens.
settings.dav_caldav_birthdays_export: Export all birthdays in one file
settings.dav_caldav_tasks_export: Export all tasks in one file
settings.dav_carddav_export: Export all contacts in one file
settings.dav_connect_help: You can connect your contacts and/or calendars with this base url on you phone or computer.
settings.dav_connect_help2: Use your login (email) and password, or create an API token to authenticate.
settings.dav_description: Here you can find all settings to use WebDAV resources for CardDAV and CalDAV exports.
settings.dav_url_base: Base url for all CardDAV and CalDAV resources:
settings.delete_desc: Do you wish to delete your account? Warning: deletion is permanent and all your data will be erased permanently.
settings.delete_notice: Are you sure to delete your account? There is no turning back.
settings.email_help: This is the email used to login, and this is where you’ll receive your reminders.
settings.export_be_patient: Dışarı aktarma işlemini başlatmak için butona tıklayın. Bu işlem birkaç dakika sürebilir - lütfen sabırlı olun butona sürekli basmayın.
settings.export_sql_explanation: Exporting your data in SQL format allows you to take your data and import it to your own Monica instance. This is only valuable if you do have your own server.
settings.export_sql_link_instructions: Note: read the instructions to learn more about importing this file to your instance.
settings.import_blank_description: We can import vCard files that you can get from Google Contacts or your Contact manager.
settings.import_blank_question: Would you like to import contacts now?
settings.import_blank_title: You haven’t imported any contacts yet.
settings.import_in_progress: The import is in progress. Reload the page in one minute.
settings.import_report_number_contacts: Number of contacts in the file
settings.import_result_stat: Uploaded vCard with 1 contact (:total_imported imported, :total_skipped skipped)|Uploaded vCard with :total_contacts contacts (:total_imported imported, :total_skipped skipped)
settings.import_upload_behaviour_help: Note: Replacing will replace all data found in the vCard, but will keep existing contact fields.
settings.import_upload_rule_cant_revert: Make sure data is accurate before uploading, as you can’t undo the upload.
settings.import_upload_rule_instructions: Export instructions for Contacts.app (macOS) and Google Contacts.
settings.import_upload_rule_multiple: For now, if your contacts have multiple email addresses or phone numbers, only the first entry will be picked up.
settings.import_upload_rule_time: It might take up to 1 minute to upload the contacts and process them. Be patient.
settings.import_upload_rule_vcard: We support the vCard 3.0 format, which is the default format for Contacts.app (macOS) and Google Contacts.
settings.import_upload_rules_desc: We do however have some rules:
settings.import_upload_title: Import your contacts from a vCard file
settings.import_vcard_parse_error: Error when parsing the vCard entry
settings.name: Adınız: :name
settings.personalisation_paid_upgrade: This is a premium feature that requires a Paid subscription to be active. Upgrade your account by visiting Settings > Subscription.
settings.personalization_activity_type_category_a: Add a new activity type category
settings.personalization_activity_type_category_d: An activity done with one of your contact can have a type and a category type. Your account comes by default with a set of predefined category types, but you can customize everything here.
settings.personalization_activity_type_category_m: Yeni bir etkinlik türü kategorisi ekle
Are you sure you want to delete this category? Deleting it will delete all associated activity types. However, activities that belong to this category will not be affected by this deletion.
We can’t find this activity type category.
How should we name this new category?
settings.personalization_activity_type_modal_dele: Are you sure you want to delete this activity type? Activities that belong to this category will not be affected by this deletion.
We can’t find this activity type.
settings.personalization_activity_type_modal_ques: How should we name this new activity type?
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_add_s: The contact field type has been successfully added.
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_delet: The contact field type has been deleted with success.
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_descr: Here you can configure all the different types of contact fields that you can associate to all your contacts. If in the future, a new social network appears, you will be able to add this new type of ways of contacting your contacts right here.
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_edit_: The contact field type has been successfully updated.
settings.personalization_contact_field_type_modal: Are you sure you want to delete this contact field type? Deleting this type of contact field will delete ALL the data with this type for all your contacts.
Delete an existing contact field type
Edit an existing contact field type
You can associate an icon with this contact field type. You need to add a reference to a Font Awesome icon.
Each new contact field type can be clickable. If a protocol is set, we will use it to trigger the action that is set.
Add a new contact field type
settings.personalization_genders_desc: You can define as many genders as you need to. You need at least one gender type in your account.
settings.personalization_genders_modal_default: Is this the default gender for a new contact?
settings.personalization_genders_modal_delete_des: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
settings.personalization_genders_modal_delete_que: You currently have {count} contact that has this gender. If you delete this gender, what gender should this contact have?|You currently have {count} contacts that have this gender. If you delete this gender, what gender should these contacts have?
This gender is the default one. If you delete this gender, which one will be the next default?
settings.personalization_genders_modal_error: Please choose a valid gender from the list.
settings.personalization_genders_modal_name_help: The name used to display the gender on a contact page.
settings.personalization_genders_modal_sex_help: Used to define the relationships, and during the VCard import/export process.
settings.personalization_module_desc: Some people don’t need all the features. Below you can toggle specific features that are used on a contact sheet. This change will affect ALL your contacts. Note that if you turn off one of these features, data will not be lost - we will simply hide the feature.
settings.personalization_reminder_rule_desc: For every reminder that you set, we can send you an email some days before the event happens. You can toggle those notifications here. Note that those notifications only apply to monthly and yearly reminders.
settings.personalization_title: Here you can find different settings to configure your account. These features are more for “power users” who want maximum control over Monica.
settings.recovery_generate_help: Be aware that generating new codes will invalidate previously generated codes
settings.recovery_help_information: You can use each recovery code once.
settings.reminder_time_to_send: Time of the day reminders should be sent
settings.reminder_time_to_send_help: For your information, your next reminder will be sent on {dateTime}.
settings.reset_desc: Do you wish to reset your account? This will remove all your contacts, and the data associated with them. Your account will not be deleted.
settings.reset_notice: Are you sure to reset your account? There is no turning back.
settings.reset_success: Your account has been reset successfully
settings.security_help: Change security matters for your account.
settings.storage_account_info: Your account limit: :accountLimit Mb /  Your current usage: :currentAccountSize Mb (:percentUsage%)
settings.storage_description: Here you can see all the documents and photos uploaded about your contacts.
settings.storage_upgrade_notice: Upgrade your account to be able to upload documents and photos.
settings.stripe_error_api_connection: Network communication with Stripe failed. Try again later.
settings.stripe_error_card: Your card was declined. Decline message is: :message
settings.stripe_error_rate_limit: Too many requests with Stripe right now. Try again later.
settings.subscriptions_account_current_paid_plan: You are on the :name plan. Thanks so much for being a subscriber.
settings.subscriptions_account_free_plan: You are on the free plan.
settings.subscriptions_account_free_plan_benefits: Support the project on the long run, so we can introduce more great features.
settings.subscriptions_account_free_plan_upgrade: You can upgrade your account to the :name plan, which costs $:price per month. Here are the advantages:
settings.subscriptions_account_next_billing: Your subscription will auto-renew on :date. You can cancel subscription anytime.
settings.subscriptions_account_payment: Which payment option fits you best?
settings.subscriptions_account_upgrade_choice: Pick a plan below and join over :customers persons who upgraded their Monica.
settings.subscriptions_account_upgrade_title: Upgrade Monica today and have more meaningful relationships.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_limitations: The free plan has limitations. In order to be able to downgrade, you need to pass the checklist below:
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_contacts: You must not have more than :number contacts
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_contacts_co: You currently have 1 contact.|You currently have :count contacts.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_invitations: You must not have pending invitations
You currently have 1 pending invitation sent to people.|You currently have :count pending invitations sent to people.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_users: You must have only 1 user in your account
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_rule_users_const: You currently have 1 user in your account.|You currently have :count users in your account.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_success: You are back to the Free plan!
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_thanks: Thanks so much for having tried the paid plan. We keep adding new features on Monica all the time – so you might want to come back in the future to see if you might be interested in taking a subscription again.
settings.subscriptions_downgrade_title: Downgrade your account to the free plan
settings.subscriptions_help_change_desc: You can cancel anytime, no questions asked, and all by yourself – no need to contact support or whatever. However, you will not be refunded for the current period.
settings.subscriptions_help_change_title: What if I change my mind?
settings.subscriptions_help_discounts_desc: We do! Monica is free for students, and free for non-profits and charities. Just contact the support with a proof of your status and we’ll apply this special status in your account.
settings.subscriptions_help_discounts_title: Do you have discounts for non-profits and education?
settings.subscriptions_help_limits_plan: Yes. Free plans let you manage :number contacts.
settings.subscriptions_help_limits_title: Is there any limit to the number of contacts we can have on the free plan?
settings.subscriptions_help_opensource_desc: Monica is an open source project. This means it is built by an entirely benevolent community who just wants to provide a great tool for the greater good. Being open source means the code is publicly available on GitHub, and everyone can inspect it, modify it or enhance it. All the money we raise is dedicated to build better features, have more powerful servers, help pay the bills. Thanks for your help. We couldn’t do it without you – literally.
settings.subscriptions_help_opensource_title: What is an open source project?
settings.subscriptions_help_title: Additional details you may be curious about
settings.subscriptions_plan_include2: Unlimited number of contacts • Unlimited number of users • Reminders by email • Import with vCard • Personalization of the contact sheet
settings.subscriptions_plan_include3: 100% of the profits go the development of this great open source project.
settings.subscriptions_plan_year_bonus: Peace of mind for a whole year
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_charge: We’ll charge your card USD $:price now. The next charge will be on :date. If you ever change your mind, you can cancel anytime, no questions asked.
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_charge_handled: The payment is handled by Stripe. No card information touches our server.
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_infos: We couldn’t be happier. Enter your payment info below.
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_success: Thank you! You are now subscribed.
settings.subscriptions_upgrade_thanks: Welcome to the community of people who try to make the world a better place.
settings.tags_blank_description: Tags work like folders, but you can add more than one tag to a contact. Go to a contact and tag a friend, right below the name. Once a contact is tagged, go back here to manage all the tags in your account.
settings.tags_blank_title: Tags are a great way of categorizing your contacts.
settings.tags_list_delete_confirmation: Etiketi silmek istediğinizden emin misiniz? Bağlantılar silinmeyecek, sadece etiket silinecektir.
settings.tags_list_description: You can organize your contacts by setting up tags. Tags work like folders, but you can add more than one tag to a contact. To add a new tag, add it on the contact itself.
settings.u2f_buttonAdvise: If your security key has a button, press it.
settings.u2f_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this key?
settings.u2f_enable_description: Add a new U2F security key
settings.u2f_error_bad_request: The visited URL doesn’t match the App ID or your are not using HTTPS
settings.u2f_error_device_ineligible: The presented device is not eligible for this request. For a registration request this may mean that the token is already registered, and for a sign request it may mean that the token does not know the presented key handle.
settings.u2f_error_timeout: Timeout reached before request could be satisfied.
settings.u2f_noButtonAdvise: If it does not, remove it and insert it again.
settings.u2f_success: Your key is detected and validated.
settings.users_accept_title: Accept invitation and create a new account
settings.users_add_confirmation: I confirm that I want to invite this user to my account. This person will access ALL my data and see exactly what I see.
settings.users_add_description: This person will have the same rights as you do, including inviting other users and deleting them (including you). Therefore, make sure you trust this person.
settings.users_add_email_field: Enter the email of the person you want to invite
settings.users_add_title: Invite a new user by email to your account
settings.users_blank_add_title: Would you like to invite someone else?
settings.users_blank_description: This person will have the same access that you have, and will be able to add, edit or delete contact information.
settings.users_blank_title: You are the only one who has access to this account.
settings.users_error_already_invited: You already have invited this user. Please choose another email address.
settings.users_error_email_already_taken: This email is already taken. Please choose another one
settings.users_error_email_not_similar: This is not the email of the person who’ve invited you.
settings.users_error_please_confirm: Please confirm that you want to invite this user before proceeding with the invitation
settings.users_invitation_deleted_confirmation_me: The invitation has been successfully deleted
settings.users_invitation_need_subscription: Adding more users requires a subscription.
settings.users_invitations_delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this invitation?
settings.users_list_delete_confirmation: Are you sure to delete this user from your account?
settings.users_list_invitations_explanation: Below are the people you’ve invited to join Monica as a collaborator.
settings.users_list_title: Users with access to your account

validation.after_or_equal: :attribute tarihi :date tarihinden sonra veya tarihine eşit olmalıdır.
validation.alpha_dash: :attribute sadece harfler, rakamlar ve tirelerden oluşmalıdır.
validation.before: :attribute şundan daha önceki bir tarih olmalıdır :date.
validation.before_or_equal: :attribute tarihi :date tarihinden önce veya tarihine eşit olmalıdır.

max.array: :attribute değeri :max adedinden az nesneye sahip olmalıdır.

validation.required_unless: :attribute alanı, :other alanı :value değerlerinden birine sahip olmadığında zorunludur.
validation.required_with_all: :attribute alanı herhangi bir :values değeri varken zorunludur.
validation.required_without_all: :attribute alanı :values değerlerinden herhangi biri yokken zorunludur.
